taskDescription:
Given the two algebraic expressions <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow>
    <mo>(</mo>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mi>x</mi>
      <mo>+</mo>
      <mn>2</mn>
    </mrow>
    <mo>)</mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\left( {x + 2} \right)</annotation></semantics></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow>
    <mo>(</mo>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mi>x</mi>
      <mo>+</mo>
      <mi>y</mi>
      <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
      <mn>5</mn>
    </mrow>
    <mo>)</mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\left( {x + y-5} \right)</annotation></semantics></math> , the solution is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mi>x</mi>
      <mn>2</mn>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
  <mo>+</mo>
  <mi>x</mi>
  <mi>y</mi>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>3</mn>
  <mi>x</mi>
  <mo>+</mo>
  <mn>2</mn>
  <mi>y</mi>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>10</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{x^2} + xy-3x + 2y-10</annotation></semantics></math> . What mathematical operation was performed on the two algebraic expressions?
